name: MCNearbyServiceAdvertiser
desc: The MCNearbyServiceAdvertiser class publishes an advertisement for a specific service that your app provides through the Multipeer Connectivity framework and notifies its delegate about invitations from nearby peers.

items.name: init(peer: MCPeerID, discoveryInfo: [String : String]?, serviceType: String)
var delegate: MCNearbyServiceAdvertiserDelegate?
items.desc: The delegate object that handles advertising-related events.

items.name: var discoveryInfo: [String : String]?
items.desc: The info dictionary passed when this object was initialized.

items.name: var myPeerID: MCPeerID
items.desc: The local peer ID for this instance.

items.name: var serviceType: String
items.desc: The service type that your app is advertising

items.name: func startAdvertisingPeer()
items.desc: Begins advertising the service provided by a local peer.

items.name: func stopAdvertisingPeer()
items.desc: Stops advertising the service provided by a local peer.
